mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT e.erp_vendor_code, k.qua_material_chk_date, c.com_material_code, c.com_material_name, m.mat_inout_quantity, k.qua_material_chk, k.qua_material_p_qty, qf.qua_material_f_qty, cf.com_material_f_name FROM erp_material_order e, qua_material_chk k, qua_material_f qf, com_material c, mat_inout m, com_material_f cf WHERE e.erp_material_order_code = k.erp_material_order_code AND k.qua_material_statement = qf.qua_material_statement AND qf.com_material_f_code = cf.com_material_f_code AND k.com_material_code = c.com_material_code AND c.com_material_code = m.com_material_code ORDER BY erp_material_order_code DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{lastIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{firstIndex}
